column19: does so is a thing of wonder. Don\u2019t let any harm come over this sheer innocence. If you have a toddler at home and you have been running from pillar to post to find something that will care for your baby\u2019s soft skin more than you ever can
column20: then here\u2019s a little something just for you. Bring home the Himalaya Moisturizing Baby Soap and allow Himalaya\u2019s many years of expertise in the domain of skin care and hygiene allow you to breathe easy. Ideal for both baby boys and girls
column21:
this baby soap keeps dryness and toughening of skin at bay.

\r\n

\r\n\tThe mildness of the bathing bar is formulated specially for and tested for a baby\u2019s fragile skin. Enriched with Vitamin E

column14:
'desc': [u'

Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo (200 ml) Price: Rs.127

The way you care about your hair
column15: the same way take care of your child\u2019s hair with this Gentle Baby Shampoo from Himalaya. Perfectly designed for boys and girls
column16: this Himalaya Gentle Baby Shampoo will give your children a unique experience of rejuvenation. Enriched with rice
column20: this Gentle Baby Shampoo will cleanse their hair in the most unique way. Your little one is sure to get that soft and supple hair with this Baby Shampoo. Also
column21:
rice will promote hair growth and shoe flower will leave their hair hydrated.

\r\n

\r\n\tBesides nourishing their tender hair roots
column22: this herbal Shampoo will prevent hair fall. With the presence of the hibiscus extract in this Gentle Shampoo
column23: your little one will attain that silky smooth hair. Additionally
column24:
this Baby Shampoo will add that unique shine to their hair. Your child’s hair will have the accurate amount of moisture with this Himalaya Shampoo. This Shampoo is safe and will not cause tears.

Directions for Use

  • Take an adequate amount of this shampoo onto your palm.
  • Massage gently on wet hair and work up a lather.
  • Rinse off.
']
